fieldDescription: Enable Abyssal Entropy Projector hullmod for enemy Abyssal ships (Random Assortment of Things). Requires reload.
Enable Adaptive Metastatic Growth hullmod for enemy Remnant Mess Objects (Hazard Mining Incorporated). Requires reload.
Enable various adaptive hullmods for Volantian Remnant Conversion ships (Volantian Reclamation Initiative). Requires reload.

fieldName: Adjust difficulty of NPC Remnant fleets
fieldDescription:
Challenging adds adaptive hullmods to all NPC Remnant fleets. 
Hard does not add hullmods, but NPC Remnant fits are optimized.
Easy replaces NPC adaptive hullmods with time slowdown penalty.
Requires reload.
